titleStmt.title: A petition delivered to the Parliament of Scotland by the commissioners of the generall assembly of the Kirk, Aprill 18. 1648. For a right understanding between the kingdoms, for settling religion and peace. And for confirming the covenant and the Presbyterian government. With their supplication concerning the Kings Majesty. And their demands from the parliament of England.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed (according to the copy sent from Edenburgh) by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
